sense.def:
Kadar dogodki
coincide
, se odvijajo v istem času.

seg.quote: Macmillan's departure coincided with Benn's return.
I'm afraid our holidays don't coincide this year.

sense.def:
Kadar mnenja ali zamisli dveh ali več ljudi
coincide
, so enaka.

seg.quote: On the whole their views coincided.
This coincided with my own private opinion.

sense.def:
Kadar dve ali več črt ali točk
coincide
, so natančno na istem kraju.

seg.quote: The boundary of the L.E.A. coincides with a county boundary.
